004
005package edu.wpi.first.math.geometry;
006
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonAutoDetect;
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonCreator;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnoreProperties;
010import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
011import edu.wpi.first.math.interpolation.Interpolatable;
012import java.util.Objects;
013
014/** Represents a 2D pose containing translational and rotational elements. */
015@JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = true)
016@JsonAutoDetect(getterVisibility = JsonAutoDetect.Visibility.NONE)
017public class Pose2d implements Interpolatable<Pose2d> {
018  private final Translation2d m_translation;
019  private final Rotation2d m_rotation;
020
021  /** Constructs a pose at the origin facing toward the positive X axis. */
022  public Pose2d() {
023    m_translation = new Translation2d();
024    m_rotation = new Rotation2d();
025  }
026
027  /**
028   * Constructs a pose with the specified translation and rotation.
029   *
030   * @param translation The translational component of the pose.
031   * @param rotation The rotational component of the pose.
032   */
033  @JsonCreator
034  public Pose2d(
035      @JsonProperty(required = true, value = "translation") Translation2d translation,
036      @JsonProperty(required = true, value = "rotation") Rotation2d rotation) {
037    m_translation = translation;
038    m_rotation = rotation;
039  }
040
041  /**
042   * Constructs a pose with x and y translations instead of a separate Translation2d.
043   *
044   * @param x The x component of the translational component of the pose.
045   * @param y The y component of the translational component of the pose.
046   * @param rotation The rotational component of the pose.
047   */
048  public Pose2d(double x, double y, Rotation2d rotation) {
049    m_translation = new Translation2d(x, y);
050    m_rotation = rotation;
051  }
052
053  /**
054   * Transforms the pose by the given transformation and returns the new transformed pose.
055   *
056   * <pre>
057   * [x_new]    [cos, -sin, 0][transform.x]
058   * [y_new] += [sin,  cos, 0][transform.y]
059   * [t_new]    [  0,    0, 1][transform.t]
060   * </pre>
061   *
062   * @param other The transform to transform the pose by.
063   * @return The transformed pose.
064   */
065  public Pose2d plus(Transform2d other) {
066    return transformBy(other);
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * Returns the Transform2d that maps the one pose to another.
071   *
072   * @param other The initial pose of the transformation.
073   * @return The transform that maps the other pose to the current pose.
074   */
075  public Transform2d minus(Pose2d other) {
076    final var pose = this.relativeTo(other);
077    return new Transform2d(pose.getTranslation(), pose.getRotation());
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * Returns the translation component of the transformation.
082   *
083   * @return The translational component of the pose.
084   */
085  @JsonProperty
086  public Translation2d getTranslation() {
087    return m_translation;
088  }
089
090  /**
091   * Returns the X component of the pose's translation.
092   *
093   * @return The x component of the pose's translation.
094   */
095  public double getX() {
096    return m_translation.getX();
097  }
098
099  /**
100   * Returns the Y component of the pose's translation.
101   *
102   * @return The y component of the pose's translation.
103   */
104  public double getY() {
105    return m_translation.getY();
106  }
107
108  /**
109   * Returns the rotational component of the transformation.
110   *
111   * @return The rotational component of the pose.
112   */
113  @JsonProperty
114  public Rotation2d getRotation() {
115    return m_rotation;
116  }
117
118  /**
119   * Transforms the pose by the given transformation and returns the new pose. See + operator for
120   * the matrix multiplication performed.
121   *
122   * @param other The transform to transform the pose by.
123   * @return The transformed pose.
124   */
125  public Pose2d transformBy(Transform2d other) {
126    return new Pose2d(
127        m_translation.plus(other.getTranslation().rotateBy(m_rotation)),
128        m_rotation.plus(other.getRotation()));
129  }
130
131  /**
132   * Returns the other pose relative to the current pose.
133   *
134   * <p>This function can often be used for trajectory tracking or pose stabilization algorithms to
135   * get the error between the reference and the current pose.
136   *
137   * @param other The pose that is the origin of the new coordinate frame that the current pose will
138   *     be converted into.
139   * @return The current pose relative to the new origin pose.
140   */
141  public Pose2d relativeTo(Pose2d other) {
142    var transform = new Transform2d(other, this);
143    return new Pose2d(transform.getTranslation(), transform.getRotation());
144  }
145
146  /**
147   * Obtain a new Pose2d from a (constant curvature) velocity.
148   *
149   * <p>See <a href="https://file.tavsys.net/control/controls-engineering-in-frc.pdf">Controls
150   * Engineering in the FIRST Robotics Competition</a> section 10.2 "Pose exponential" for a
151   * derivation.
152   *
153   * <p>The twist is a change in pose in the robot's coordinate frame since the previous pose
154   * update. When the user runs exp() on the previous known field-relative pose with the argument
155   * being the twist, the user will receive the new field-relative pose.
156   *
157   * <p>"Exp" represents the pose exponential, which is solving a differential equation moving the
158   * pose forward in time.
159   *
160   * @param twist The change in pose in the robot's coordinate frame since the previous pose update.
161   *     For example, if a non-holonomic robot moves forward 0.01 meters and changes angle by 0.5
162   *     degrees since the previous pose update, the twist would be Twist2d(0.01, 0.0,
163   *     Units.degreesToRadians(0.5)).
164   * @return The new pose of the robot.
165   */
166  public Pose2d exp(Twist2d twist) {
167    double dx = twist.dx;
168    double dy = twist.dy;
169    double dtheta = twist.dtheta;
170
171    double sinTheta = Math.sin(dtheta);
172    double cosTheta = Math.cos(dtheta);
173
174    double s;
175    double c;
176    if (Math.abs(dtheta) < 1E-9) {
177      s = 1.0 - 1.0 / 6.0 * dtheta * dtheta;
178      c = 0.5 * dtheta;
179    } else {
180      s = sinTheta / dtheta;
181      c = (1 - cosTheta) / dtheta;
182    }
183    var transform =
184        new Transform2d(
185            new Translation2d(dx * s - dy * c, dx * c + dy * s),
186            new Rotation2d(cosTheta, sinTheta));
187
188    return this.plus(transform);
189  }
190
191  /**
192   * Returns a Twist2d that maps this pose to the end pose. If c is the output of a.Log(b), then
193   * a.Exp(c) would yield b.
194   *
195   * @param end The end pose for the transformation.
196   * @return The twist that maps this to end.
197   */
198  public Twist2d log(Pose2d end) {
199    final var transform = end.relativeTo(this);
200    final var dtheta = transform.getRotation().getRadians();
201    final var halfDtheta = dtheta / 2.0;
202
203    final var cosMinusOne = transform.getRotation().getCos() - 1;
204
205    double halfThetaByTanOfHalfDtheta;
206    if (Math.abs(cosMinusOne) < 1E-9) {
207      halfThetaByTanOfHalfDtheta = 1.0 - 1.0 / 12.0 * dtheta * dtheta;
208    } else {
209      halfThetaByTanOfHalfDtheta = -(halfDtheta * transform.getRotation().getSin()) / cosMinusOne;
210    }
211
212    Translation2d translationPart =
213        transform
214            .getTranslation()
215            .rotateBy(new Rotation2d(halfThetaByTanOfHalfDtheta, -halfDtheta))
216            .times(Math.hypot(halfThetaByTanOfHalfDtheta, halfDtheta));
217
218    return new Twist2d(translationPart.getX(), translationPart.getY(), dtheta);
219  }
220
221  @Override
222  public String toString() {
223    return String.format("Pose2d(%s, %s)", m_translation, m_rotation);
224  }
225
226  /**
227   * Checks equality between this Pose2d and another object.
228   *
229   * @param obj The other object.
230   * @return Whether the two objects are equal or not.
231   */
232  @Override
233  public boolean equals(Object obj) {
234    if (obj instanceof Pose2d) {
235      return ((Pose2d) obj).m_translation.equals(m_translation)
236          && ((Pose2d) obj).m_rotation.equals(m_rotation);
237    }
238    return false;
239  }
240
241  @Override
242  public int hashCode() {
243    return Objects.hash(m_translation, m_rotation);
244  }
245
246  @Override
247  @SuppressWarnings("ParameterName")
248  public Pose2d interpolate(Pose2d endValue, double t) {
249    if (t < 0) {
250      return this;
251    } else if (t >= 1) {
252      return endValue;
253    } else {
254      var twist = this.log(endValue);
255      var scaledTwist = new Twist2d(twist.dx * t, twist.dy * t, twist.dtheta * t);
256      return this.exp(scaledTwist);
257    }
258  }
259}
